00045 #include <avr32/io.h>
00046 #include "compiler.h"
00047 #include "preprocessor.h"
00048 #include "eic.h"
00049 
00050 
00051 
00052 void eic_init(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const eic_options_t *opt, const unsigned int nb_lines)
00053 {
00054   int i;
00055   for (i=0;i<nb_lines;i++)
00056   {
00057     // Set up mode level
00058     eic->mode = ((opt[i].eic_mode)==1)?(eic->mode|(opt[i].eic_mode)<<(opt[i].eic_line)):(eic->mode&~((opt[i].eic_mode)<<(opt[i].eic_line)));
00059     // Set up edge type
00060     eic->edge = ((opt[i].eic_edge)==1)?(eic->edge|(opt[i].eic_edge)<<(opt[i].eic_line)):(eic->edge&~((opt[i].eic_edge)<<(opt[i].eic_line)));
00061     // Set up level
00062     eic->level = ((opt[i].eic_level)==1)?(eic->level|(opt[i].eic_level)<<(opt[i].eic_line)):(eic->level&~((opt[i].eic_level)<<(opt[i].eic_level)));
00063     // Set up if filter is used
00064     eic->filter = ((opt[i].eic_filter)==1)?(eic->filter|(opt[i].eic_filter)<<(opt[i].eic_line)):(eic->filter&~((opt[i].eic_mode)<<(opt[i].eic_line)));
00065     // Set up which mode is used : asynchronous mode/ synchronous mode
00066     eic->async = ((opt[i].eic_async)==1)?(eic->async|(opt[i].eic_async)<<(opt[i].eic_line)):(eic->async&~((opt[i].eic_mode)<<(opt[i].eic_line)));
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void eic_enable_lines(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int mask_lines)
00071 {
00072   eic->en = mask_lines;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void eic_enable_line(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int line_number)
00076 {
00077   // Enable line line_number
00078   eic->en = (1<<line_number);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void eic_disable_lines(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int mask_lines)
00082 {
00083   eic->dis = mask_lines;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void eic_disable_line(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int line_number)
00087 {
00088   // Disable line line_number
00089   eic->dis = (1<<line_number);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void eic_enable_interrupt_lines(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int mask_lines)
00093 {
00094   eic->ier = mask_lines;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void eic_enable_interrupt_line(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int line_number)
00098 {
00099   // Enable line line_number
00100   eic->ier = (1<<(line_number));
00101 }
00102 
00103 void eic_disable_interrupt_lines(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int mask_lines)
00104 {
00105   eic->idr = mask_lines;
00106 }
00107 
00108 void eic_disable_interrupt_line(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int line_number)
00109 {
00110   // Disable line line_number
00111   eic->idr = (1<<(line_number));
00112 }
00113 
00114 void eic_clear_interrupt_lines(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int mask_lines)
00115 {
00116   eic->icr = mask_lines;
00117 }
00118 
00119 void eic_clear_interrupt_line(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic, const unsigned int line_number)
00120 {
00121   // Clear line line_number
00122   eic->icr = (1<<(line_number));
00123 }
00124 
00125 void eic_enable_interrupt_scan(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic,unsigned int presc)
00126 {
00127   // Enable SCAN function with PRESC value
00128   eic->scan |= (presc<<AVR32_EIC_SCAN_PRESC_OFFSET)|(1<<AVR32_EIC_SCAN_EN_OFFSET);
00129 }
00130 
00131 void eic_disable_interrupt_scan(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic)
00132 {
00133   // Disable SCAN function
00134   eic->scan = (0<<AVR32_EIC_SCAN_EN_OFFSET);
00135 }
00136 
00137 unsigned long eic_get_interrupt_pad_scan(volatile avr32_eic_t *eic)
00138 {
00139   // Return pad number that causes interrupt
00140   return(eic->scan>>AVR32_EIC_SCAN_PIN_OFFSET);
00141 }
